div.div: *Updated- As of Friday March 30, 2020, Governor Doug Ducey and State Superintendent Kathy Hoffman jointly announced the closure of all Arizona schools through the end of the current school year.* This information is designed to provide a synopsis of the situation of COVID-19 (Coronavirus) and how it relates to Nadaburg Unified School District. The district has and will continue to be ready to protect student and staff health and well-being.
div.a: Read More about COVID-19 (Coronavirus Update) Updated 3/30

div.div: Nadaburg Unified School District announces two (2) Board Vacancies. If you are interested in consideration for being appointed an open seat, please submit a Letter of Interest to Nadaburg Unified School District Governing Board.
div.a: Read More about Nadaburg Announces Governing Board Vacancies

div.div: Desert Oasis Elementary School Nadaburg Elementary School Both received a “B” for their school letter grade for 2018/2019!
div.a: Read More about School Letter Grades for 2018/2019

div.div: ABC 15 conducted an interview with our Superintendent Dr. Aspasia Angelou. This segment focuses on the upcoming bond election.
div.a: Read More about ABC 15 NEWS INTERVIEW

div.div: Did you know Arizona law allows taxpayers to receive a dollar-for-dollar tax credit for contributions made to extracurricular activities and other special programs? Take a moment and support our schools, when you file your Tax Credit with Nadaburg School District!
div.a: Read More about Nadaburg Tax Credit
